amendment.description: To allow Medicare beneficiaries who are enrolled in fallback plans to remain in such plans for two years by requiring the same contracting cycle for fallback plans as Medicare Prescription Drug plans.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1002 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 238.

Amendment SA 1002 proposed by Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S8390-8392, S8393-8394, S8408-8409; text: CR S8390) To allow Medicare beneficiaries who are enrolled in fallback plans to remain in such plans for two years by requiring the same contracting cycle for fallback plans as Medicare Prescription Drug plans.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1002 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 45. Record Vote Number: 238.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1002 proposed by Senator Lincoln.
